text: tavrātayada injīlayada, ovungē deviyangē sannidhānayen ovunṭa pahaḷa karana lada (anit) dharmayanda, (ættenma) ovun bāragena anugamanaya kara tibuṇē nam (kisima amārukamak nomætiva) ovunṭa ihaḷin (ahasin)da, ovungē pādayanṭa yaṭin (bhūmiyen)da anubhava karannaṭa iḍa tibuṇi. namut ovungen samaharekma (ṛju mārgayehi siṭina) dæhæmi janatāvak vaśayen siṭinnāha. ovungen bahutarayak karana kriyāvan itāmat napuru dæya vaśayenma ættēya
